animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I like to eat peanuts!
🐘 I'm the biggest land animal
💦 I use my trunk to spray water

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I love to play with yarn
🥛 I like to drink milk
🐈 I purr when I'm happy

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very tall
🦒 I have spots
🌿 I eat leaves.

animal.question: I live in the water and have scales. I swim with fins. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I am a type of animal
🌊 I live in the ocean or a river.
🐡 I can be many different colors

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes help me camouflage
🌱 I eat grass.
🐎 I look like a horse.

animal.question: I am a large cat with a mane, known as the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 👑 I'm a symbol of power
🦁 I roar loudly
☀️ Males have a big fur around the face

animal.question: I hop around and carry my baby in a pouch. I live in Australia. What am I?

hints.text: 🦘 I'm known for my powerful legs.
👶 My young are called joeys.
🇦🇺 You can find me in Australia

animal.question: I'm a reptile with a hard shell on my back. I move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I live on land or in water.
🥬 I like to eat lettuce.
🏠 I can hide my head inside my shell.

animal.question: I fly at night and eat insects. Some people think I am scary. What am I?

hints.text: 🦇 I live in caves.
🌙 I am active when you are sleeping.
🔊 I navigate using echolocation.

animal.question: I live in the Arctic and have thick fur to keep me warm. I hunt seals. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I live in a very cold place
🐻‍❄️ My fur is white.
🐾 I am a very strong swimmer.

bug.question: I have six legs and I love to buzz. I make honey! Who am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow and black.
🌷 I like to fly near flowers.
🍯 I live in a hive.

bug.question: I jump very high and I'm green. I make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: ☘️ I'm often found in grassy fields.
🎶 I make a noise you can hear in summer.
🦵 I have strong back legs for jumping.

bug.question: I have bright spots and I'm good luck, or so they say. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am often red with black spots.
🐞 Farmers like me because I eat other bugs that harm plants.
🌱 You might find me in a garden.

bug.question: I build my home underground and work hard all day long. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.
🐜 I live in a colony with many others.
🍂 I carry food back to my home.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then I spin a cocoon, and then I fly with beautiful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I go through a big change called metamorphosis.
🌈 I have brightly colored wings.
🌸 I drink nectar from flowers.

bug.question: I glow in the dark on a summer night. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I use bioluminescence to create light.
🌌 I am often seen flying at dusk.
✨ I flash my light to attract a mate.

bug.question: I have a long, sticky tongue that I use to catch my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I stay very still to trick my prey.
🦗 I eat other insects.
🙏 My front legs look like I'm praying.

bug.question: I look like a stick and can be hard to find. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I use camouflage to hide from predators.
🍃 I eat leaves.
🌿 I am long and slender.

bug.question: I make a loud noise by rubbing my wings together. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 Only the males make the loud sound.
☀️ I am often heard during the hottest part of summer.
🌳 I live in trees for most of my life.

bug.question: I carry my home on my back and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 My shell protects me from danger.
🥬 I enjoy eating leafy green vegetables.
🐌 I leave a slimy trail behind me.
